title: Qualitative Research-Based Expert Training Program for Understanding Literacy Learning Differences

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic scientific terminology and proficiency in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: A learner group consisting of entry-level professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, aiming to strengthen job competencies through improved scientific literacy, composed of learners with diverse cultural backgrounds and learning experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze diverse literacy learning styles using qualitative research methodologies to derive five or more learning differences.
Learners can design and simulate three or more educational strategies that leverage literacy learning differences as positive resources.
Learners can execute two or more collaborative approaches tailored to peersâ€™ literacy characteristics through project-based peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
